question: The 42nd World Congress of the International Committee of Military Medicine was began in __________.
explanation: The 42nd World Congress of the International Committee of Military Medicine (ICMM) organized by the Armed Forces Medical Services (AFMS) under the aegis of the Ministry of Defence (MoD) began in New Delhi. The five-day event is being organized for the first time in India and is the largest medical conference ever organized by the AFMS. The theme of this 42nd World Congress is "Military Medicine in Transition: Looking Ahead".
